text: From being an assembler in an aircraft factory to becoming a paint sprayer in a ceramic factory, he can be qualified for a completely new job in less time than it takes air game played with ball, bats and wickets between two sides consisting of eleven players each. Not so, dear Oxford Dictionary.
handwritten_text: From being an assembler in an aircraft factory to becoming a paint sprayer in a ceramic factory, he can be qualified for a completely new job in less time than it takes air game played with ball, bats and wickets between two sides consisting of eleven players each. Not so, dear Oxford Dictionary.
